CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Config.​Targets.​OutputBase

CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Config.​Targets.​OutputBase
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Config.​Targets.​HTMLOutputFolder

A base class for the configuration of all output targets.

Functions
OutputBase
public OutputBase (
PropertyLocation propertyLocation
)
OutputBase
public OutputBase (
OutputBase toCopy
)
Duplicate
abstract public OutputBase Duplicate ()
IsSameTarget
public abstract bool IsSameTarget (
OutputBase other
)

Override to determine whether the two output targets are fundamentally the same.  Only primary identifying properties should be compared, so two HTMLOutputFolders should return true if they point to the same folder, and secondary properties like those in ProjectInfo are ignored.

Properties
ProjectInfo
public ProjectInfo ProjectInfo { get }

The ProjectInfo for this output target.  The object will always be defined, even if none of its properties are.

Number
public int Number { get; set }

The number of the output target, or zero if it isn't defined.  Numbers are used to determine the folder name each output target can use to save its working data.

Property Locations
NumberPropertyLocation
public PropertyLocation NumberPropertyLocation { get; set }

Where Number is defined, or Source.NotDefined if it isn't.
